name: Purple Slime
movement: climb 10 ft., swim 30 ft., walk 20 ft.
description: The Purple Slime is a large ooze with a vibrant purple hue, capable of squeezing through tight spaces and surviving in both air and water.
memorable: Its ability to reduce a target's Strength score dramatically and its immunity to many conditions make it a formidable opponent.
goals: To ambush and incapacitate prey using its sticky and toxic spikes.
environment: Found in both aquatic settings and damp environments.
strengths: Exceptional strength and high hit points; immune to acid and cold damage.
weaknesses: Poor dexterity makes it less capable of avoiding attacks.
attacks: Multiattack with two spike attacks, dealing both piercing and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to reduce an opponent's Strength score, potentially leading to their death if reduced to 0.
senses: Blindsight up to 60 ft., but is blind beyond that radius.
skills: Average stealth skill due to low dexterity.
additional_information: Amorphous ability allows it to fit through narrow spaces.
Amphibious nature enables breathing in air and water.
Underwater camouflage provides advantage on stealth checks while submerged.
Immune to a variety of conditions including fear and exhaustion.
High Constitution score enhances its overall durability.
test_queries: large purple ambush predator in water
ooze that weakens foes by reducing strength
durable slime that can swim and climb
creature with high poison damage attacks
amphibious creature immune to acid and cold
